[GRAMMAR]: minor errors in verb tense consistency
[LEXICON]: occasional use of outdated or formal vocabulary
[SYNTAX]: some sentences are wordy or have complex structures

[LOGIC]: a few abrupt transitions between ideas
[STRUCTURE]: the text could benefit from clearer sectioning or subheadings
[CLARITY]: some sentences are unclear or require re-reading

[GRAMMAR]: incorrect use of "should had" instead of "should have"
multiple instances of "would had" instead of "would have"
[LEXICON]: some word choices are awkward or unclear

[LOGIC]: some paragraphs seem disconnected from the main argument
[TRANSITION]: abrupt jumps between ideas and time periods
[CLARITY]: some sentences are wordy or confusing
